TopicTitle: Mission to minmus!(ship in construction, need to know what mods to use or if to even use any!)

Articles.Content: alright. I decided the moon was kind of boring(all I could get was midlands and stranded kerbals) but now I have decided to go to minmus. my plan is to reconfigure a moon mission rocket, and get it into orbit. afterwards, I am going to set up a manuever node opposite where minmus is equitorially aligned(meaning where it crosses my equitorial orbit) and do the burn. I will then land just like on the moon. keep going down, burn, keep it at about 10 m/s from 500 meters (above ground, not sea level) and go to as slow as possible for under 10 meters

Depends...what kind of launch power are you looking for? I you need any sort of serious heavy lifting, I would highly suggest you use the KW Rocketry. That is what I use primarily as the tanks also have more fuel than stock. If you want to get a simple lander, such as the Apollo Lunar lander, than I would suggest you use the Saturn V from either the FASA pack or the one by OLDD. These are my suggestions due to simplicity of mission. However, I am having a hard time deciphering exactly what you are going for your mission parameters. I could not tell if you are planning to do a direct acsent, in which the ship itself is the lander or going for a Minmus orbit rendezvous in which you would transfer your crew into a smaller lander to carry out the mission.

Edited January 15, 2015 by Sampa
the ship itself should be the lander, and plan on using far
I am using no mods, and have a probe. will post it shortly
